name: Pavonia Paranormal
description:
Pavonia Paranormal is a friendship simulator where you play as a lonely pizza deliverer invited by your best friend Fern to go ghost hunting! 

Meet Tulip, Salem, and Kasper! Hunt ghosts, explore creepy buildings, and make friends! 

This game is a point-and-click visual novel with minigames that require a working mouse and keyboard. 

Playtime approx 45min - 1hr.

This is a demo! More chapters are currently in the works. Follow for more on our Twitter!
